title: Graves + Hurricane?
body:
Sooo can someone tell me how that works?  How about Graves with 100% Crit rate, IE and Hurricane?

No access to life server at this moment so I can't test it.

Additionally, do Jinx rockets do extra splash with Hurricane?

replies.body:
> Additionally, do Jinx rockets do extra splash with Hurricane?

Yes. I've tested this before because I was curious.

I'll see if I can test Graves + Runaan's and see what happens when I add in 100% crit. Honestly, I'm not expecting Runaan's to work with Graves just because of the nature of his attacks, we'll see though.

EDIT: Tried it out just now, and Runaan's works. The extra crit chance just means you'll have the 8 (or 10 with IE) shots on your attacks more often, with it being every shot at 100% (from what I could tell that is).
